subject: Re: mol
body:
On Fri, Apr 13, 2007 at 05:03:58PM -0400, robert nuzum wrote:
> Anyone know how to get mac-on-linux working in an eMac.  I have Debian
> etch installed with osx 4.9. Synaptic installs the mol but when I try
> to start it the screen flashes briefly and then dies.

Hello Robert,

You should try to get help on the appropriate mailing list, like debian-user.
debian-mirrors deals with the network of debian mirrors. 

Regards,

-- 
Simon Paillard


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
